title: Reference docs audit and CLAUDE.md update
Audit and update execute-protocol.md for remaining references
desc: Final audit pass on execute-protocol.md for any remaining references to deleted/consolidated scripts not caught in plan 09-06. Search for: route-trivial, route-medium, route-high, qa-gate-post-task, qa-gate-post-plan, qa-gate-post-phase, validate-plan.sh, validate-naming.sh, validate-config.sh, validate-gates.sh, validate-deps.sh, qa-code (agent). Update all stale references. Verify the effort step-skip language from plan 09-04 is consistently applied throughout.

title: Audit cross-team-protocol.md and multi-dept-protocol.md
desc: Review cross-team-protocol.md and multi-dept-protocol.md for accuracy against current implementation. Fix: (1) Any references to qa-code agents (now merged into qa), (2) Any references to deprecated scripts, (3) Ensure handoff artifact schemas match handoff-schemas.md updates from plan 09-08, (4) Update agent counts and department agent lists. Remove redundant content between the two files.

title: Audit qa-output-patterns.md for merged QA agent
desc: Update qa-output-patterns.md: remove qa-code specific patterns, merge into qa patterns with mode annotations (mode=plan vs mode=code). Ensure all example outputs and JSON schemas match current script output formats from consolidated qa-gate.sh.

title: Update CLAUDE.md with Phase 9 decisions and changes
desc: Add Phase 9 decisions to CLAUDE.md Key Decisions table: (1) QA/QA-Code merged into single QA agent with two modes, (2) Step-skip effort cascading (not per-agent degradation), (3) Script consolidation via lib/yolo-common.sh + parameterized scripts, (4) YOLO_AGENT_MODE enforcement (mandatory export/unset), (5) Context budget enforcement via --measure, (6) Mermaid architecture diagrams for ongoing audit, (7) Cross-phase research persistence, (8) Escalation state persistence. Update agent count from ~38 to ~35. Add docs/ARCHITECTURE.md to key files list.

title: Remove outdated content from references directory
desc: Audit all references/*.md and references/*.toon files for outdated content. Specifically: (1) audit-checklist.md — verify all checklist items still apply post-consolidation, (2) company-hierarchy.md — update for QA-Code removal (merged into QA), (3) effort-profile-*.toon — verify they match updated step-skip semantics from plan 09-04. Remove any sections that reference deprecated scripts, agents, or patterns.
